mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.timestep_no AS "timestepNo", a.timestep_name AS "timestepName", a.starttime AS "starttime", a.endtime AS "endtime", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.status AS "status"
mapper.select: SELECT max(a.timestep_no) AS "timestepNo" FROM cdboo_timestep a WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cdboo_timestep( id, timestep_no, timestep_name, starttime, endtime, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{timestepNo}, #{timestepName}, #{starttime}, #{endtime}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cdboo_timestep SET timestep_no = #{timestepNo}, timestep_name = #{timestepName}, starttime = #{starttime}, endtime = #{endtime}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
